Literature Review: High-energy to ultrahigh-energy neutrino interactions have been a subject of intense research in the field of particle physics and astrophysics. The study of neutrino interactions is crucial in understanding the properties of neutrinos and their role in the universe. In this review, we will discuss the current state of knowledge on neutrino interactions, focusing on energies larger than 1 TeV.
